beforeSaveCustomScript:
assignedUserId = '6828d804307680842';// assing di


ifThen(
  assignedUserId != null,
  sendEmail(
    assignedUserId,
    'New Tour Inquiry Assigned',
    'A new inquiry has been assigned to you. Please log in and follow up.' + "\n\n" +
    'Inquiry Name: ' + name + "\n" +
    'Preferred Travel Date: ' + string(travelDate) + "\n" +
    'Contact Email: ' + email
  )
);
